title: ABC! Name My Food!: An Alphabet and food recognition book for kids.
description: An interactive alphabet and food recognition book for toddlers.The companion book to "1 2 3! What can I eat?" and "Red, Blue, and Green! What colors are on my plate", "ABC! Name My Food!" is a food-themed book for young readers.Children look through over 100 brightly colored images of foods and identify the beginning letter of each food item. Fruits, vegetables, baked goods, meats, and cheeses are all included in this book. Children are prompted to think independently of foods they know and their beginning letter. Come along for the journey and discover new delicious foods.
author: Unabashed Kids
